Burn Stuff
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: Burn Stuff
By Phoenix Masta on Saturday, October 7, 2000 - 11:27 pm:

This is a song dedicated to phoenixes everywhere killing Most and Pabs for raising that white powderpuff. It is to the tune of Break Stuff by Limp Bizkit(this is gonna be fun coming up with non-offensive words for all the cussing)

Its just one of those days when ya don't wanna fight Most
Everything is burned
Every trainer sucks(sorry its not a cuss word at least)
You don't really know why but ya wanna justify burning Pabs' head off
No assistant contact
and if you interact
your ranch is on contract
your best bet is to stay away cruddy monsters
it's just one of those days
(chorus)It's all about the he brags she brags attitude
I think you better quit lettin' brags slip
or you'll be leavin' with a burned lip
It's all about the he brags she brags attitude
I think ya better quit talkin that crud

It's just one of those days feelin like a GS'ed monster
First one ta complain leaves with a 1st degree
Dang right I'm a maniac
better watch your back cause I'm screwin' up your program
and if you're stuck up
ya just lucked up
next in line ta get burned up
your best bet is to stay away crappy trainers
its just one of those days
chorus punk
I feel like crud
my suggestion is to keep your distance
cause right now I'm dangerous
we've all felt like crud
been treated like crud
all those crappy trainers
that wanna step up
I hope ya know I pack a big flame
I'll burn your hide black
and if my day keeps goin this way I just might
burn somethin tonight
I hope ya know I pack a big flame
I'll burn your hide black
and if my day keeps goin this way I just might
burn somethin tonight
I hope ya know I pack a big flame
I'll burn your hide black
and if my day keeps goin this way I just might
burn your ugly face tonight
Give me somethin to burn
Give me somethin to burn
Just give me somethin to burn
how bout your ugly face
I hope ya know I pack a big flame WHAT!!!
a big flame WHAT!!!
a hot ol' big flame WHAT!!!
so come and get it...
chorus
punk so come and get it!!!
be seein' ya
/0> ^-^ <0\
